metadata.explanation: For dy/dx = 4y, separate variables: (1/y) dy = 4 dx. Integrate: ln|y| = 4x + C. Exponentiating: y = Ae^(4x) where A = e^C.

apiResponse.error: OpenRouter API error (403): {"error":{"message":"Key limit exceeded (total limit). Manage it using https://openrouter.ai/settings/keys","code":403}}
